column4: i got kernel panic randomly, i checked system log, but nothing has found, where else should i check? i use feisty, on a fujits-siemens a7640 laptop, there wasn't any problem with previous kubuntu versions. any suggestions?
#1 culprit is vid cards, #2 usb hal/nonsense
could you tell me more please what are you asking? i've got sis video card, no compiz/beryl
